page.title: 12OUR HOBBIES-4
page.content: when we find them.I like fungi collecting because of the pleasure in finding a perfect{Puffball}or{Boletus {edilous. We go hunting down by the river Tavy. It is a woody,grassy and marsh ground. Because of the different habitats you would find a wide variety of species. In the woody areas you would find {Chanterell,Shaggy parasol}and on some occasions Puffballs.in the grassy areas you would find{Boletus edilous, {puffballs,Shaggy parasol,Parasol mushrooms.In the marshy grounds you would find mostly inedible fungi. PETER LORENZI. My hobby is collecting stamps.I have got about 530 of them.I have got the most rare stamp in the world but only on a piece of paper.It is worth Â£77690 and it is purple.I haven't got many in my album.
